verses.verse: וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, Now when Jacob כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki that יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- that there was שֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7668><s%> She-ver corn בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob לְבָנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> le-va-Nav, unto his sons לָ֖מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why תִּתְרָאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> tit-ra-'U. Why do ye look

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti, Behold I have heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki that יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- that there is שֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7668><s%> She-ver corn בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt רְדוּ־ <S%H3381><s%> re-du- get you down שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there וְשִׁבְרוּ־ <S%H7666><s%> ve-shiv-ru- thither and buy לָ֣נוּ La-nu מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham, place וְנִחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> ve-nich-Yeh for us from thence that we may live וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and not נָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> na-Mut. and not die

וַיֵּרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> vai-ye-re-Du went down אֲחֵֽי־ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei- brethren יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph's עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah; ten לִשְׁבֹּ֥ר <S%H7666><s%> lish-Bor to buy בָּ֖ר <S%H1250><s%> bar corn מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. in Egypt

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בִּנְיָמִין֙ <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min But Benjamin אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi brother יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, Joseph's לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach sent יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav; not with his brethren כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, for he said פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- Lest peradventure יִקְרָאֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7122><s%> yik-ra-'En-nu befall him אָסֽוֹן׃ <S%H611><s%> a-Son. mischief

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לִשְׁבֹּ֖ר <S%H7666><s%> lish-Bor to buy בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch [corn] among הַבָּאִ֑ים <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im; those that came כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become הָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ha-ra-'Av for the famine בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz was in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

וְיוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> ve-yo-Sef, And Joseph ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he הַשַּׁלִּ֣יט <S%H7989><s%> hash-shal-Lit [was] the governor עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, over the land ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu who הַמַּשְׁבִּ֖יר <S%H7666><s%> ham-mash-Bir [and] he [it was] that sold לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am to all the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came אֲחֵ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei brethren יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, and Joseph's וַיִּשְׁתַּֽחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-ta-cha-vu- and bowed down ל֥וֹ lo אַפַּ֖יִם <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pa-yim themselves before him [with] their faces אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-re-tzah. to the earth

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav his brethren וַיַּכִּרֵ֑ם <S%H5234><s%> vai-yak-ki-Rem; and he knew וַיִּתְנַכֵּ֨ר <S%H5234><s%> vai-yit-nak-Ker them but made himself strange אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber unto them and spake אִתָּ֣ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam to them קָשׁ֗וֹת <S%H7186><s%> ka-Shot, roughly וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer unto them and he said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem to מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> me-'A-yin unto them Whence בָּאתֶ֔ם <S%H935><s%> ba-Tem, come וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, ye;And they said מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz From the land כְּנַ֖עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an of Canaan לִשְׁבָּר־ <S%H7666><s%> lish-bor- to buy אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> 'O-chel. food

וַיַּכֵּ֥ר <S%H5234><s%> vai-yak-Ker knew יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav; his brethren וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem like לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not הִכִּרֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H5234><s%> hik-ki-Ru-hu. but they knew

וַיִּזְכֹּ֣ר <S%H2142><s%> vai-yiz-Kor remembered יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, And Joseph אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הַחֲלֹמ֔וֹת <S%H2472><s%> ha-cha-lo-Mot, the dreams אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חָלַ֖ם <S%H2492><s%> cha-Lam which he dreamed לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer of them and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem to מְרַגְּלִ֣ים <S%H7270><s%> me-rag-ge-Lim unto them Ye [are] spies אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem, you לִרְא֛וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> 'er-Vat the nakedness הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land בָּאתֶֽם׃ <S%H935><s%> ba-Tem. ye are come

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo No אֲדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni; unto him Nay my lord וַעֲבָדֶ֥יךָ <S%H5650><s%> va-'a-va-Dei-cha are thy servants בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u come לִשְׁבָּר־ <S%H7666><s%> lish-bor- but to buy אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> 'O-chel. food

כֻּלָּ֕נוּ <S%H3605><s%> kul-La-nu are all בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei sons אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- man's אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad [are] all one נָ֑חְנוּ <S%H5168><s%> Na-che-nu; We כֵּנִ֣ים <S%H3651><s%> ke-Nim we [are] true אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu, ourselves לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha [men] thy servants מְרַגְּלִֽים׃ <S%H7270><s%> me-rag-ge-Lim. are no spies

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem; to לֹ֕א <S%H3808><s%> lo No כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- at עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> 'er-Vat the nakedness הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land בָּאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> ba-Tem ye are come לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot. unto them Nay but to see

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru, And they said שְׁנֵ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָׂר֩ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten עֲבָדֶ֨יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha Thy servants אַחִ֧ים׀ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chim brethren אֲנַ֛חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu ourselves בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- man אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad of one בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold הַקָּטֹ֤ן <S%H6996><s%> hak-ka-Ton and behold the youngest אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- is with אָבִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-nu with our father הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, [is] this day וְהָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> ve-ha-'e-Chad and one אֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-Nen-nu. is no

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem about יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; And Joseph ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to them דִּבַּ֧רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti unto them That [is it] that I spake אֲלֵכֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Chem about לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor unto you saying מְרַגְּלִ֥ים <S%H7270><s%> me-rag-ge-Lim Ye [are] spies אַתֶּֽם׃ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem. you

בְּזֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> be-Zot Hereby תִּבָּחֵ֑נוּ <S%H974><s%> tib-ba-Che-nu; ye shall be proved חֵ֤י <S%H2416><s%> chei By the life פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh of Pharaoh אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- shall not תֵּצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> te-tze-'U ye shall not go forth מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh, this כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo בְּב֛וֹא <S%H935><s%> be-Vo come אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi-Chem brother הַקָּטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> hak-ka-Ton hence except your youngest הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah. here

שִׁלְח֨וּ <S%H7971><s%> shil-Chu Send מִכֶּ֣ם <S%H4480><s%> mik-Kem at אֶחָד֮ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one וְיִקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> ve-yik-Kach of you and let him fetch אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲחִיכֶם֒ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi-Chem your brother וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you הֵאָ֣סְר֔וּ <S%H631><s%> he-'A-se-Ru, and ye shall be kept in prison וְיִבָּֽחֲנוּ֙ <S%H974><s%> ve-yib-ba-cha-Nu may be proved דִּבְרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1697><s%> div-rei-Chem, that your words הַֽאֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> ha-'e-Met whether [there be any] truth אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem; in וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹ֕א <S%H3808><s%> lo you or else חֵ֣י <S%H2416><s%> chei by the life פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh, of Pharaoh כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki surely מְרַגְּלִ֖ים <S%H7270><s%> me-rag-ge-Lim surely ye [are] spies אַתֶּֽם׃ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem. he

וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> vai-ye-'e-Sof And he put them all together אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in מִשְׁמָ֖ר <S%H4929><s%> mish-Mar into ward שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet three יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. days

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶ֤ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem about יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, unto them the third זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise עֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su This do וִֽחְי֑וּ <S%H2421><s%> vich-Yu; and live אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him God אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יָרֵֽא׃ <S%H3372><s%> ya-Re. fear

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if כֵּנִ֣ים <S%H3651><s%> ke-Nim If ye [be] true אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem, you אֲחִיכֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi-Chem of your brethren אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, [men] let one יֵאָסֵ֖ר <S%H631><s%> ye-'a-Ser be bound בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house מִשְׁמַרְכֶ֑ם <S%H4929><s%> mish-mar-Chem; of your prison וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu go הָבִ֔יאוּ <S%H935><s%> ha-Vi-'u, ye carry שֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7668><s%> She-ver corn רַעֲב֥וֹן <S%H7459><s%> ra-'a-Von for the famine בָּתֵּיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1004><s%> bat-tei-Chem. of your houses
